channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: The Joyful Mysteries is the first of four Mysteries of the Rosary, which starts with Jesus' birth and the Annunciation, including the Visitation and Nativity.

channel.title: The Litany Of The Blessed Virgin Mary
